text:
Lambda Labs | Software Engineer (iOS / Computer Vision) | Palo Alto, CA (University Ave.) | Onsite | Full Time

We're hiring a Software Engineer with iOS and Computer Vision experience. Math, EE, CS, or Physics degree. If you love math and software engineering, you'll fit right in. Required experience:

- Experience shipping multiple Objective-C apps that are currently available in the app store.

- An aptitude for design, ability to innovate using all of the tools available for iOS Ideal candidates will have:

- Multiple apps in the app store.

- A track record of making high quality mobile user experiences. - Proficiency with basic computer vision and image processing operations.

To apply, please email your resume and github link to: s[at]lambdal.com
